title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 55 - APPROVAL OF LABORATORIES
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 55 - APPROVAL OF LABORATORIES
State Regulations

Subpart 55-1 - Approval Of Laboratories And Institutions For Use Of Living Animals And For Requisition And Allocation Of Animals From Pounds

Subpart 55-2 - APPROVAL OF LABORATORIES PERFORMING ENVIRONMENTAL ANALYSIS (§ 55-2.1 to 55-2.15)

Subpart 55-3 - Environmental Laboratory Approval Fee (§ 55-3.1 to 55-3.10)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 55

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§225, 502, 504, 505; Agriculture and Markets Law, §353

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
